text: Jean Valls is a former England international lawn and indoor bowler. ==Bowls career== Valls won two bronze medals in the pairs and fours at the 1985 World Outdoor Bowls Championship in Melbourne in addition to winning a bronze medal at the Commonwealth Games She also won three National Titles; (singes 1983), (pairs 1982 & 1983). She subsequently won the singles at the British Isles Bowls Championships in 1984. ==References== Category:English female bowls players Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:English sportswomen Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Bowls players at the 1986 Commonwealth Games
title: Jean Valls
